survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Mental Health Counseling Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the on-site mental health counseling services provided by the company, assessing accessibility, quality, and impact on well-being.

questions.question_text: How often have you utilized the on-site mental health counseling services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How often have you utilized the on-site mental health counseling services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the on-site mental health counseling services do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse feedback. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What aspects of the on-site mental health counseling services do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the on-site mental health counseling services?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the on-site mental health counseling services?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site mental health counseling services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site mental health counseling services?

questions.question_text: Have the on-site mental health counseling services positively impacted your overall well-being or work performance?
answer_options: No, I have not used the services
questions.client_notes: Include an option for non-users to avoid skewing results. Single-choice format recommended.

script.question_text: Have the on-site mental health counseling services positively impacted your overall well-being or work performance?
answer_options: No, I have not used the services
